attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price of petrol is shortly expected to reach over 120 pence/litre. 
This is too high. Commuters and companies are suffering due to the constant and rapid petrol increases. 
Most of this cost is due to tax (approximately 2/3 of the price) and not the price of oil. 
Please consider lowering the tax rate to avoid the country grinding to a halt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
